001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump;
002
003import org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.dump.render.RenderSpec;
004
005/**
006 * Utility-class that is a static facade of {@link ObjectPrinter.ToString},
007 * where the serializing of an object is provided with {@link JacksonTree}.
008 * <hr/>
009 * Set of methods with the second {@link RenderSpec} arguments
010 * allow to suppress the default highlighting by providing {@code new RenderSpec(Highlight.HONE, ...)}.
011 */
012public class DumpUtils {
013
014    /**
015     * @param objToDump object to dump
016     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles JSON-elements
017     * @return JSON-representation of an object in text-format as {@link String}
018     */
019    public static String dumpAsJsonTxt(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
020        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
021        printer.printAsJsonTxt(objToDump, renderSpec);
022        return printer.toString();
023    }
024
025    /**
026     * @param objToDump object to dump
027     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles JSON-elements
028     * @return JSON-representation of an object in HTML-format as {@link String}
029     */
030    public static String dumpAsJsonHtml(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
031        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
032        printer.printAsJsonHtml(objToDump, renderSpec);
033        return printer.toString();
034    }
035
036    /**
037     * @param objToDump object to dump
038     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles JSON-elements
039     * @return JSON-representation of an object in SVG-format as {@link String}
040     */
041    public static String dumpAsJsonSvg(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
042        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
043        printer.printAsJsonSvg(objToDump, renderSpec);
044        return printer.toString();
045    }
046
047    /**
048     * @param objToDump object to dump
049     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles YAML-elements
050     * @return YAML-representation of an object in text-format as {@link String}
051     */
052    public static String dumpAsYamlTxt(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
053        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
054        printer.printAsYamlTxt(objToDump, renderSpec);
055        return printer.toString();
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * @param objToDump object to dump
060     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles YAML-elements
061     * @return YAML-representation of an object in HTML-format as {@link String}
062     */
063    public static String dumpAsYamlHtml(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
064        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
065        printer.printAsYamlHtml(objToDump, renderSpec);
066        return printer.toString();
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * @param objToDump object to dump
071     * @param renderSpec an instance of {@link RenderSpec} to customize some styles YAML-elements
072     * @return YAML-representation of an object in SVG-format as {@link String}
073     */
074    public static String dumpAsYamlSvg(Object objToDump, RenderSpec renderSpec) {
075        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
076        printer.printAsYamlSvg(objToDump, renderSpec);
077        return printer.toString();
078    }
079
080    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
081
082    /**
083     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
084     * @return JSON-representation of an object in text-format as {@link String}
085     */
086    public static String dumpAsJsonTxt(Object objToDump) {
087        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
088        printer.printAsJsonTxt(objToDump);
089        return printer.toString();
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
094     * @return JSON-representation of an object in HTML-format as {@link String}
095     */
096    public static String dumpAsJsonHtml(Object objToDump) {
097        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
098        printer.printAsJsonHtml(objToDump);
099        return printer.toString();
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
104     * @return JSON-representation of an object in SVG-format as {@link String}
105     */
106    public static String dumpAsJsonSvg(Object objToDump) {
107        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
108        printer.printAsJsonSvg(objToDump);
109        return printer.toString();
110    }
111
112    /**
113     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
114     * @return YAML-representation of an object in text-format as {@link String}
115     */
116    public static String dumpAsYamlTxt(Object objToDump) {
117        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
118        printer.printAsYamlTxt(objToDump);
119        return printer.toString();
120    }
121
122    /**
123     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
124     * @return YAML-representation of an object in HTML-format as {@link String}
125     */
126    public static String dumpAsYamlHtml(Object objToDump) {
127        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
128        printer.printAsYamlHtml(objToDump);
129        return printer.toString();
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * @param objToDump object to dump with default highlighting
134     * @return YAML-representation of an object in SVG-format as {@link String}
135     */
136    public static String dumpAsYamlSvg(Object objToDump) {
137        ObjectPrinter.ToString printer = new ObjectPrinter.ToString();
138        printer.printAsYamlSvg(objToDump);
139        return printer.toString();
140    }
141}
